sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-hSyn-SOUL-P2A-tdTomato was a gift from Guoping Feng (Addgene plasmid # 153019)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Step-function opsin with ultra-high light sensitivity (SOUL). Capable to be used for noninvasive stimulation in mice and minimally invasive stimulation in macaque..
